name: MyHealthTeams, Inc.
description: Developer of the patient social network platform in chronic health intended to help communities of people better manage conditions. The company's platform creates disease-specific social networks and helps to get referrals and share tips with other people who are personally facing chronic conditions, enabling patients to see around corners with access to medically-approved content, safe support, and connections to thousands of other patients going through the same thing.
one_liner: Developer of the patient social network platform in chronic health intended to help communities of people better manage conditions. The company's platform creates disease-specific social networks and helps to get referrals and share tips with other people who are personally facing chronic conditions, enabling patients to see around corners with access to medically-approved content, safe support, and connections to thousands of other patients going through the same thing.
